context.p: Perform the following steps to disassemble the tool.

step.cmd: Check the equipment ID number of the tool.

substep.cmd: Record the ID number on the first page of the Maintenance Check Sheet.

step.cmd: Ensure the latest ST-GL-HAL-SSS-510 and GD-GL-HAL-TSS-910 and assembly drawing is available at the work station.

substep.cmd: Record these are available at the work station on the Maintenance Check Sheet.

step.cmd: Determine if the equipment is in the vertical position for disassembly.

substep.cmd: Record the equipment position on the Maintenance Check Sheet.

step.cmd: Determine if the equipment has been operated or not operated.

substep.cmd: Record if the equipment has been operated or not operated on the Maintenance Check Sheet.

step.cmd: Move the tool to the designated disassemble area.
